section.name: FreeMarker service
section.p: This service let you use the great template mechanism FreeMarker as injectable service in your Tapestry application.

subsection.name: Configuration
subsection.p:
optionaly insert your individual
FreeMarker configuration
This may be null, so the service create its own minimalistic configuration.
